item.title: This Simple Trick Could End Your Acid Reflux Suffering - Try it Tonight!
item.description: IV. Conclusion Introduction Acid reflux is a common condition that can cause pain and discomfort in many people. It occurs when stomach acid flows back up into the esophagus, causing a burning sensation in the chest or throat. Symptoms of acid reflux can include heartburn, regurgitation, chest pain, difficulty swallowing, and a sour taste in the mouth. Causes of Acid Reflux There are several potential causes of acid reflux. Diet is one of the most common triggers, with certain foods and drinks, such as coffee, chocolate, and citrus fruits, known to increase the risk of acid reflux.
